ginyu.inputs: 5M 2M 236M 236S(Guldo) 5H 236S(Recoome) 5H 236S(Burtur) 66-Hold sjc jLM SD M 236L S(Jeice) (66 or 44 or jump) DR
ginyu.title: Guldo
tips: - The 5H after Recoome is manually timed (delay or held) for Guldo to disappear when Burtur is called
- SD on or a fraction after Burtur hits the opponent
- For the DR, easiest is to land first, then jump. But it's possible to stay the same side in the air with/without an air backdash

ginyu.inputs: 5M 2M 236M 236S(Guldo) 5L 236S(Recoome) j(S/M)H 236S(Burtur) jL-(on the way down) sj M 2H (delay) SD 214S(Jeice + Burtur) LL2H jc LLL 236L DR
ginyu.title: Guldo
tips: - After Burtur, jump high for the super jump, don't jM too soon.
- SD on or a fraction after Burtur hits the opponent
- Visual cue of success - Ginyu is horizontal on SD hit

ginyu.inputs: 5M 2M 236H 236S(Recoome) 2M 236L 236S(Burtur) 66-Hold 5M jc LL (delay) SD-(on Burtur hit) M 236L S(Jeice) land DR
ginyu.title: Recoome
tips: - SD on or a fraction after Burtur hits the opponent

ginyu.inputs: 5M 2M 236M 236S(Recoome) 5L 236L 236S(Burtur) 5M jc LL2H (delay) SD M 236L S(Jeice) (land) 44 (dash under) DR
ginyu.title: Recoome
tips: - SD on or a fraction after Burtur hits the opponent

ginyu.inputs: 5M 2M 236H 236S(Burtur) 5M jc LL2H SD-(on Burtur hit) jM 236L S(Jeice) (66 or 44 or jump) DR
ginyu.title: Burtur
tips: - SD on or a fraction after Burtur hits the opponent
- For the DR, easiest is to land first, then jump. But it's possible to stay the same side in the air with/without an air backdash

ginyu.inputs: 2M 5M jc LL 236H 236S(Burtur) (ginyu drifts) LL (delay) LL2H jc 4L4L 236L S(Jeice) (66 or 44 or jump) DR
ginyu.title: Burtur
tips: - Delay after jLL to reset the auto combo, in order to do it again after Burtur hit
- After j2H, 4L 4L is important to not get jM
- For the DR, easiest is to land first, then jump. But it's possible to stay the same side in the air with/without an air backdash

ginyu.inputs: 5M 2M 236M 236S(Burtur) L M sjc jM 2H SD-(on Burtur hit) 214S(Jeice) LL2H jc LLL 236L DR
ginyu.title: Burtur
tips: - Unlike Guldo corner route, no delay between sjc and jM
- Visual cue of success - Ginyu SD hits at a 45 degree angle

ginyu.inputs: 2M 5M jc LL 236H S(Jeice) S(Guldo) SD LL2H jc LLL
ginyu.title: Jeice

ginyu.inputs: 5M 2M 236M S(Jeice) L jc LL2H jc LLL 236L DR
ginyu.title: Jeice

ginyu.inputs: 5M 2M 236M S(Jeice) 5L 236S(Guldo) 5L 236S(Recoome) jMH 236S(Burtur) jL-(on the way down) sj jLM (delay) jc LL S(Jeice) land DR
ginyu.title: Jeice
tips: - The super jump should be high to retain height for the double jc
- Delay the jc enough for Burtur to hit while calling Jeice

janemba.inputs: 2M 5M jc (instant)-j2H 2147H-(hold up) jM 2M H-(activate Hell Gate) whiff-5L L 2M 5M 5H S SD-(on fireball hit) jLM jc LL 2H 2M
janemba.title: Hell Gate H

janemba.inputs: 2M 5M jc (instant)-j2H 2147H-(hold up) jM S 236L H-(activate Hell Gate) 5LL 2M 5M 5H S SD-(on fireball hit) jLM jc LL 2H 2M
janemba.title: Hell Gate H
